description: This file defines a UI component called 'Button' using the LightningJS framework, including its template, state, and input behavior.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a toggle button with text that updates based on its 'favorited' state.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input to toggle the 'isFavorited' state.
